summary: Oneworld is an airline alliance with 15 members, founded in 1999. Its goal is to be the top choice for international travelers. The headquarters are in Fort Worth, Texas. Member airlines include well-known names like American Airlines, British Airways, and Qantas. They operate a large fleet of over 3,000 planes, serving almost 1,000 airports worldwide. This alliance carries nearly 500 million passengers annually, making it the third-largest global airline alliance.
title: Oneworld
